description:
So you're thinking about writing a Kindle book. Congratulations! It's a lot of fun - and profitable, too. IF you do it right!

With all the hype and misdirection about Kindle publishing, it's easy to get off track. This course will walk you through some of the common errors in thinking and execution, so that you have a clear path to Kindle Success.

Plus you'll get answers to the burning questions all new (or renewing) authors have. Questions like:

  • Where do I start?
  • How long will it take?
  • How much can I make?
  • How should I price my book?
  • How do I get more reviews?

And so much more!

Take this opportunity to go beyond the hype and get real answers from a real author. I'm not just teaching it - I'm doing it every day!
title: Kindle Success Secrets
